description.value:
You can alter your exoskeleton's size. You constantly gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]{Enlarge}. You can dismiss or resume these effects as an action, which has the concentrate trait.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Enlarge]{Spell Effect: Enlarge}

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
